text: Neoterebra simonei is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Neoterebra simonei (S. Lima, Tenorio & Barros, 2007). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1416760 on 2020-01-27 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== Category:Terebridae Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Neoterebra simonei
